Package dev.prozilla.pine.core.component

Interface ComponentsProvider

All Superinterfaces:
ComponentsContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimationData, AudioPlayer, BorderImage, ButtonNode, CameraControlData, CameraData, Component, DynamicText, FrameNode, GridGroup, ImageNode, LayoutNode, LayoutNodeStyle, MultiTileRenderer, Node, NodeRoot, NodeStyle, NodeStyleBase, ParticleBurstEmitter, ParticleEmitter, ParticleFlowEmitter, ParticleRenderer, SpriteRenderer, TextInputNode, TextNode, TileRenderer, TooltipNode, Transform
public interface ComponentsProvider extends ComponentsContext
Interface with utility methods for finding certain components in the current context.
